welcome_message_title: Welcome to Nossa Senhora do Socorro
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nossa Senhora do Socorro, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the local traditions. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Bistrô Dom Fellipe

restaurants.address: Est. Socorro - Taiçoca, Nossa Senhora do Socorro, SE
